ygData.subject: RE: What to do with a level 24?
ygData.msgSnippet: For bards who hunt in South Karana, is it best to get bound in the Arena or in Qeynos?  The Arena may be quicker in terms of getting back to your corpse but
ygData.messageBody:
For bards who hunt in South Karana, is it best to get bound in the Arena or
in Qeynos? The Arena may be quicker in terms of getting back to your corpse
but you won't have a flute to sing invis song (to avoid getting attacked as
you run back to your corpse). Is this something I should be concerned with
or will the wandering mobs in SK leave me alone?

Galtin

> Also if you are hunting Aviaks you want to have a Ranger in your group.
> Since on my server (Karana) the Treehouse is majorly camped, but there are
>
> many wandering Avaiks in the area between the Treehouse and Paw. When I
> used to slow there I would just zoom around with Selo's till I found one.
>
> This was still quicker (and more fun) then fighting over the static spawn
> at
> the Treehouse :)
>
> >
> >Myself and another bard on my server, seem to be doing well in South
> Karana
> >fighting Aviaks in and around the Aviak City... We can solo Darters and
> >Rooks, and in groups we can take harriers and Avocets, these things are
> >rich
> >also. I went from just hitting 21 to well into 23 so far in a couple of
> >days.
> >
> >
